contents:
其實要看默克爾實際怎麼做你說她舔共但她卻是歐洲國家中最常談人權的她見過達賴，也讓香港魚蛋革命的兩位學...

我只能說:別對德國人抱多大期待!

我有個德國姻親在蔡司(Zeiss)工作，他的團隊負責研發艾司摩爾(ASML)EUV光刻機(生產7納米晶圓的關鍵設備)的光源模組。
最近他找我抱怨美國人施壓，不讓他們出貨給中國
我們聊到台積電已經開始建置使用下一代EUV技術的新廠了，因而催促他們加速開發生產1納米節點所需的下一代EUV光刻機設備。
我提到憂心台灣是否能滿足未來的電力需求，結果…我截錄部分對話: (我們的英文都不是很好!)

德: Maybe, China can help you by putting power cables across the sea. Or a gas pipeline, similar to the one from Russia to Germany (which the US wants to stop now!)

我: Haha, it's a pity that you can't read Chinese. There are a lot of Chinese lowlifes are threatening to wage war on us. Of course, it is not going to happen as China gov. is smarter than that. However, some called them "Chinazi" is not for nothing.

德: I would closer bonds as a possible win-win scenario, together against the US. Eventually, Taiwan will have to make that decision anyway. And being a partner of the US would possibly guarantee a very insecure future in times of "America first". China doesn't need a war for that (and I don't believe it is in their interest) - time is their partner.

細看一下可以看出德國人的態度
